Package uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.service

Class SubscriptionContentService

java.lang.Object
uk.co.zodiac2000.subscriptionmanager.service.SubscriptionContentService
@Service @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class SubscriptionContentService extends Object
Service facade for SubscriptionContent aggregates.

    Returns true if the SubscriptionContent object identified by id exists in the system.

    Updates the subscription content object identified by the id field in commandDto to the state specified by the command DTO.

  • Method Details

    • getSubscriptionContent

      public Optional<SubscriptionContentResponseDto> getSubscriptionContent(long id)
      Returns the subscription content identified by id or an empty optional if not found.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription content id
      Returns:
      a SubscriptionContentResponseDto object

    • isPresent

      public boolean isPresent(long id)
      Returns true if the SubscriptionContent object identified by id exists in the system.
      Parameters:
      id - the subscription content identifier
      Returns:
      true if the object exists

    • createSubscriptionContent

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionContentResponseDto> createSubscriptionContent(NewSubscriptionContentCommandDto commandDto)
      Creates a new subscription content aggregate and persists it. Returns a response DTO representing the new subscription content.
      Parameters:
      commandDto - command DTO representing the state of the new subscription content
      Returns:
      a SubscriptionContentResponseDto representing the new object

    • updateSubscriptionContent

      @Transactional(readOnly=false) public Optional<SubscriptionContentResponseDto> updateSubscriptionContent(UpdateSubscriptionContentCommandDto commandDto)
      Updates the subscription content object identified by the id field in commandDto to the state specified by the command DTO.
      Parameters:
      commandDto - command DTO representing the updated state of the subscription content
      Returns:
      the updated subscription content
